name: Aerospace N3XT
about: Aerospace N3XT flying school is a premier aviation training institution dedicated to fostering the next generation of professional pilots. Located at a tower-controlled airport, our program is designed to provide comprehensive training under FAA Part 141 standards. With a fleet of modern aircraft, including Cessna 172s and Piper Archers, and advanced flight simulators, we ensure students receive hands-on experience and academic knowledge necessary for FAA certifications. Our experienced instructors emphasize aviation safety, professionalism, and precision flying. We offer clear pathways to commercial pilot careers, including opportunities to transition into major airlines through our industry partnerships. At Aerospace N3XT, we are committed to equipping students with the skills and knowledge to excel in the aviation industry. Join us to embark on a rewarding and challenging career in flight.
